headline: Back on the Radar: Prior Picks Offer Fresh Opportunity
summary: Periods of volatility often create the most compelling opportunities to revisit prior ideas with fresh perspective.  This week I focus on opportunities within communication services, healthcare, and consumer staples.  Netflix  was covered by George Glover last December.

headline: Paramount Gets a Plus: Heard on the Street Tuesday Recap
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery will restart deal talks with Paramount.  The move sets the stage for a potential bidding war with Warner’s preferred suitor, Netflix.  Warner shares gained 2.7%, while Paramount rallied 4.9%.

headline: The most interesting buyer for Discovery Global after the spinout is Paramount, says Rich Greenfield
summary: Rich Greenfield, LightShed Partners co-founder, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the dueling bids for Warner Bros. Discovery from Netflix and Paramount Skydance, news of WBD reopening takeover talks with Paramount for 7 days after receiving a waver from Netflix, and more.

headline: AI Anxiety Meets a Thrifty Consumer: Wall Street’s Post-Holiday Reality Check
summary: Wall Street returned from the long weekend with a mixed performance as investors weighed heavy concerns over AI-driven software valuations against a sobering outlook from the consumer staples sector.

headline: Gary Black Says Netflix Will Emerge As 'Victor' In Warner Bros. Takeover Bid, Sees Stock Rebound To $100 Even If Paramount Wins
summary: Analyst Gary Black believes Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ: NFLX) holds the upper hand in the escalating takeover battle for Warner Bros. Discovery (NASDAQ: WBD), arguing that the streaming giant's stronger strategic synergies position it to ultimately prevail over rival bidder Paramount Skydance (NASDAQ: PSKY).

headline: Looking At The Evolving Narrative For Netflix (NFLX) After Target Resets And Warner Talks
summary: The latest update on Netflix has trimmed the central fair value estimate from US$134.44 to US$111.43, roughly a 17% reset that reflects a more cautious stance on the current setup. Analysts have tweaked assumptions across the model, including a slightly lower discount rate, a touch softer revenue growth outlook at 11.66%, and only modestly adjusted long term expectations. Together, these changes help explain why the fair value line has moved even as the fundamental story around ads, content,...

headline: Netflix Warner Bros Bid Faces Paramount Challenge And Rising Scrutiny
summary: Netflix, ticker NasdaqGS:NFLX, has granted Warner Bros. Discovery a seven day waiver to review a competing bid from Paramount Skydance. The waiver allows Paramount Skydance to submit a best and final offer as the contest to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery intensifies. Regulators and activist investors are closely watching the process, with some activists urging Warner Bros. shareholders to oppose the Netflix proposal. For Netflix, currently trading at $77.033, this bidding contest comes...
